title: Extreme Lag Spikes every 3-4 games
body: Ok this has been happening for a while and i probably should of done something about it sooner i use Foxtel Broadband internet and ever since i got it a couple of months ago the way it interacts with league of legends is weird i have no ping lag at all ingame but i cant move for cevrel minutes at a time but my ping will stay at 35 ive tryed all the things on the help and support page i really need help because i enjoy league but it dosent enjoy me i guess...

Hey,

A few questions to help see if anything jumps out.

* When the issue occurs - does the game freeze entirely (eg. nothing moving on screen, no FPS), OR does the game continue to show animations but champions, minions etc are just standing still?  (this could help work out if it is a PC issue or a connection issue)
* Does anything else using your internet connection have issues at the same time this occurs in League?
* Does it happen more at a particular time of day?
* When you changed ISP to Foxtel, did you change anything else on your home network at the same time (eg. Router, Wifi setup etc)?
* When you say you've tried everything on the help and support page, I assume you are talking about the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article (if not, try it out) :)

Cheers
